backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, shops, products, carts, bargaining, and messaging with access control and persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing currency-formatting and INRâ€‘label UI updates with affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, layout, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright text with a link and heart icon.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, authentication button, logo, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper composing header, footer, and page content area.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate showing a login prompt when unauthenticated and loading/children states appropriately.
frontend/src/components/BargainRequestFo: A form component allowing authenticated users to submit bargain offers with desired price and optional notes, sending data via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/BestDealRequestB: Button that sends a 'best deal' bargain request with zero price when clicked by an authenticated user.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state and triggering login or clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, products, shop creation, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining custom color variables and styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart by fetching items and product data, showing loading, error, empty, or itemized states, and calculating subtotal.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Shows a message thread for a specific product, loading messages and product details, and allows authenticated users to send new messages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product and shop information, supporting add-to-cart actions and initiating chats with shopkeepers.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDiscoveryPage.tsx: Lists all products for browsing with a hero section and loading/error states, allowing navigation to product details or seller signup.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProductsPag: Lets authenticated shopkeepers view their products and create new listings via a modal form with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProfileForm: React page that renders a shopkeeper profile creation form with validation and submits data via a mutation before navigating to the products page.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Utilities to normalize backend errors into readable messages and detect authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Currency helpers to format USD-cent bigint prices as INR and convert INR amounts back to USD cents.
frontend/src/utils/phoneLinks.ts: Functions that clean phone numbers and generate WhatsApp and tel link formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, versions, and included functionality for an ICP-based bargain-shopping app.
